responses.english: Prices start around {price}. Buyers usually compare whether this range fits comfortably or if stretching makes sense for a bigger layout. Which side would you like to explore?
responses.hinglish: Pricing {price} ke around start hoti hai. Is range mein buyers usually decide karte hain comfort mein rehna hai ya thoda bada layout dekhna hai. Aap kaunsa explore karna chahenge?

responses.english: It’s located in {zone}. Before I share exact details, I want to understand—are you prioritizing daily commute or long-term value?
responses.hinglish: Project {zone} side hai. Exact location share karne se pehle ek clarity chahiye—daily commute zyada important hai ya long-term value?

responses.english: That’s fine. Projects here usually work for buyers between {range1} or those exploring slightly above {range2}. Which feels closer?
responses.hinglish: No worries. Is segment mein buyers ya toh {range1} ke around dekhte hain ya phir {range2} ke upar. Kaunsa zyada closer lagta hai?

responses.english: Just to make sure I guide you correctly—what would you like to proceed with?
responses.hinglish: Main sahi guide karne ke liye confirm karna chahta hoon—aap exactly kis cheez ke saath proceed karna chahte ho?
